title: leetcode - dp 45
content:
1.i wrote the custom comparator inside the class so got error 
2.A non-static member function has an implicit this pointer, so its actual type is not bool(string,string) but bool(Solution::*)(string,string)
3.std::sort expects a callable comparator (like a free function, static function, or lambda), not a member function pointer.

title: lis consecutive for xor seq - bit manipulation
content:
1.each time xoring with n which increases +1 each time so sequence got by x^n and y^n me lis btana tha infinite sequence tha.
2.let it has k matched bits from LSB.
3.for once this will be equal may be for diff n but the with the same bits LSB to MSB not since starting bits same upto k so xoring with N+1 will be same for both so it will go on until we have done 0/1 combo in all k places so answer is 2^k
